title: Persona 4 Golden Heads to PC?! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.10.20
description:
Gary Whitta and Greg talk about the Vita exclusive apparently making its way to PC, No Man's Sky getting cross-play, and more! 

Time Stamps - 
 00:00:00 - Start
00:02:00 - Housekeeping
IT’S A HUGE WEEK OF EVENTS
Today, Andy and Nick are streaming COD
We’re Live reacting to the PS5 event Thursday @ 1 pm on Twitch!
TLOU2 Review is Friday at 12:01 am pt!
Core Game Jam is Friday after KFGD!
The Kinda Funny Showcase is back, but it’s called the Guerilla Collective! We’ve teamed up with our friends at the Media Indie Exchange to do a three-day showcase featuring nearly 90 games! It all kicks off Saturday at it’s NEW START TIME of 9 am PT on twitch!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed, Conner Nolan, Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:11:28 - PERSONA 4 to Steam?! Cass Marshall @ Polygon
00:11:35 - Do you think this is an announcement at the PC gaming show, OR will Sony be talking about how they are bringing their games to PC during their event tomorrow? - Best Friends Q:Frank Furtter
00:14:15 - No Man’s Sky Gets Crossplay, Sean Murray
00:18:50 - Gary makes a prediction!
00:23:10 - Dead Space Writer’s New Game Revealed @ PS5 Event, Jordan Oloman @ IGN
00:38:00 - Monster Hunter World Iceborne  Title Update 4 Delayed
00:39:00 - Bloodstained Surpasses a Million, Promises More DLC, Alessandro Barbosa @ GameSpot
00:40:40 - Out today
Video  Part two starts
00:00:15 -  Youtube add
 Reader mail   -
00:03:30 -  - Andrew Yeni
00:05:30 - Squad Up: Clay Guinto AKA AlterVariant on Twitch(PS4) - phear13
00:06:25 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Blessing
